Description: Sycomore fig wood shabti of Amenemipet covered with a layer of painted and varnished plaster with a black lappet wig, a brown face, a red and blue collar, brown hands with blue bracelets and holding two black hoes, the back has a yellow and red seed-basket and a red yoke with two vessels, the front and back of the legs are inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of the Dead in five rows of black painted hieroglyphs separated by red lines.
